infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railgunshelldeple: More powerful than steel shells, with better armor-piercing ability, and can cause radiation to the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railgunshellaphep: A railgun armor-piercing shell. Able to penetrate the ship's hull and detonate, equipped with a proximity fuze.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railgunshellapfsd: A reloadable railgun shell. Fires a high-speed steel dart that penetrate the hull and armor.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railgunshellacid: A defensive railgun shell loaded with special acid, spraying its content on its trace after launch. Good for hunting small creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railguncanistersh: A reloadable railgun shell. Loaded with explosive pellets.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railgundecoydropp: A defensive railgun shell that drops up to 5 explosive decoys on its trace after launch.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.railgunshellfixfo: A defensive railgun shell that releases multiple fixfoam pellets on your submarine. Can be used for emergency hull fix.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.chaingunammoboxex: Ammo for chaingun. Explodes on hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.chaingunammoboxsp: Splitter ammo for chaingun. Splits into smaller rounds on hit. Effective against unarmored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.coilgunammoboxstu: Ammunition for the coilgun. Explodes and stuns targets on impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.coilgunammoboxdel: Ammunition for the coilgun. Explode and launches sub-bolts shortly after first impact.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.flakcannonshockam: A heavy box of wide-spread electric shock ammo for the Flak Cannon. Good against swarms.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.flakcannondirecti: A heavy box of low spread armor-piercing ammo for the Flak Cannon. Good against targets behind walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.flakcannonammobox: A heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, loaded with high explosive materials that creates heart-shaped circle on detonation.
A heavy box of wide-spread shrapnel ammo for the flak cannon, loaded with pillar-shaped explosives that let shrapnels spread like branches of trees.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.pulselaserammobox: A mix-up of two types of fulgurium pulse laser ammo, switches lens mode after each shot. Containing twice as much fuel.
A box containing a special concoction of chemicals and rare materials. The lens focuses laser to improve penetration, allowing the laser to hit targets behind walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.pulsebilaserammob: A box containing a special concoction of chemicals and rare materials. The lens used splits the laser in two. Each deals less damage but can increase the hit rate.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.acidmistbomb: A bomb containing special acid, can be put into a railgun shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.bvta.empbomb: A bomb designed to destroy electrical devices, can be put into a railgun shell.
